about_the_game: Journey to the past with Edward Carnby and Emily Hartwood,  voiced by stars David Harbour (Stranger Things) and Jodie Comer (Killing Eve). Switch between their immaculately detailed modern looks and classic low-poly models on the fly, adding a delightful twist to your adventure that celebrates where the terror began.

content_descriptors.notes:
The player fights against monsters with guns and melee weapons. No excessive gore or dismemberment, but violence against non-human enemies is displayed.
Some of the game's themes imply self-harm, such as suicide and depression, but are not shown explicitly.
